articles.author: Ryan Christoffel
articles.title: iPhone 17 makes standard screen protectors not so useful - 9to5Mac
articles.description: The iPhone 17 line includes a new anti-reflective technology, but it turns out standard screen protectors aren’t the best match.
articles.content:
The iPhone 17 lineup includes a new Ceramic Shield 2 with anti-reflective technology, but it turns out standard screen protectors arent the best match for the new displays.
